contents.text: Thank you for calling Scalable Press in San Francisco, where automation reinvents mass customization and makes ordering customized goods easy.
To check your order status, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an order status specialist.

navigationGoals: I need the delivery status and estimated arrival date for my recent order.
Confirm the delivery date for my custom unit commemorative T-shirts
Query the fulfillment status of my order #1024 to verify its current production stage
I’m an older customer and would like help checking the delivery status of my recent custom mug order.
I’d like to check the delivery status of my recent custom lab component order.

contents.text: To report an issue with your order, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a support agent.

navigationGoals: I want to report a damaged item from my last order and arrange a replacement.
Report a printing error on the custom platoon T-shirts I just received
Report a defect in my recent print order #1024 and initiate a replacement workflow
As a senior, I need to report that the custom T-shirt I received arrived damaged.
I need to report an issue with my delivered custom physics model—it arrived damaged.

contents.text: For new orders and pricing, press 2.
To request a custom product quote, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our quoting team.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for a price quote on 100 custom logo t-shirts with full-color printing.
Request a quote for 150 custom morale patches featuring my unit insignia
Request a detailed API-enabled quote for a custom batch of branded merchandise
I’d like a price quote for 100 personalized greeting cards and some guidance on the options.
I want a price quote for a bespoke optical bench component for my experiments.

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss bulk pricing options for custom hoodies with a sales representative.
Speak with a sales rep about bulk ordering custom veterans’ reunion T-shirts
Connect me to a sales engineer to discuss volume pricing and integration options
I want to speak with someone about placing a bulk order for 50 custom hoodies for a family event.
I’d like to speak with a representative about bulk pricing for academic orders.
